short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Have fun browsing the web with a new mouse cursor.
short.es: Cambia el cursor de tu mouse.
short.it: Cambia il tuo cursore del mouse.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Spice up your browsing on Chrome by changing your cursor for a fun one.

This extension gives you new cursors for your mouse / trackpad on Chrome. 
You can always get back your default cursor by clicking cancel.

*** version 0.05 ****
- Cursor works in Library window.
- Automatically update cursor on all open tabs.
- Manifest V3.

Please note cursor cannot work on the Chrome store pages and new tab.
long.de:
Ändern Sie den Schieberegler Ihres Internetbrowsers.

Wählen Sie einen Cursor aus den Cursorn des Popups der Erweiterung.
long.es:
Cambie el control deslizante de su navegador de Internet.

Elija un cursor de los cursores de la ventana emergente de la extensión.
long.fr:
Changez votre curseur de souris sur Chrome. 
Choisissez un curseur parmi les cursors de la popup de l'extension.
long.it:
Cambia il cursore del tuo browser Internet.

Scegli un cursore dai cursori del popup dell'estensione.
long.no:
Bytt glidebryter for nettleser.

Velg en markør fra markørene til popup-en av utvidelsen.
